description: Discover the best hotels in Manila, Philippines. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Top-Rated Manila Serviced Apartments within Pasig City
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the stylish bayside capital of the Philippines from the opulent Discovery Suites Manila. Hidden amid the towering skyscrapers of Ortigas Business District in Pasig City, this collection of serviced apartments places guests within arms reach of popular eateries, trendy bars and fashionable boutiques. When you're not exploring the city, cool off in the swimming pool or soak in the bubbling jacuzzi. Afterwards, return to your spacious sanctuary, where high-end amenities create a home-away-from-home experience.

hotels.title: Manila Bayside Golden-Age Glamour with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Offering a captivating journey to Manila's Golden Age, the Admiral Hotel Manila boasts Filipino-Spanish design elements in a boutique setting. Set along Roxas Boulevard with a captivating rooftop infinity pool, two signature dining venues and a luxurious spa, this reimagined hotel is the perfect backdrop for romantic getaways, family vacations and memorable events. Guests find themselves within easy reach of Manila's cultural delights including Rizal Park, Intramuros, Mall of Asia and the National Museum. Each uniquely themed room invites travellers to experience the dynamic energy of Manila while enjoying the hotel's distinguished design, extraordinary gastronomy and gracious service.

hotels.title: Raffles Manila Opulence in Makati Financial District with Seven Dining Venues, World-Class Spa & Pool
hotels.description: Experience Manila from the opulence of this glamorous Raffles destination, located in the city's prestigious financial district. Spend your days exploring the cultural treasures of the Ayala Museum or shopping at the Greenbelt Mall, both just a short stroll away. At your five-star base, savour exquisite French cuisine at Mireio, indulge in a handcrafted cocktail at Mistral Rooftop Bar and sample world-class cuisine across five more dining venues. For a taste of tranquillity, retreat to the exquisite spa, or take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool.

hotels.title: Stylish Manila Retreat in Araneta City with Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of the Filipino capital with a stay at Novotel Manila Araneta City. This urban oasis in the city's bustling commercial district offers a seamless blend of modern comfort and local culture. With the Araneta City entertainment hub on your doorstep, discover a world of shopping, dining and entertainment. Indulge in a gastronomic journey across the hotel's six dining venues, each offering a unique culinary experience. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool, or maintain your fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the historic Art In Island museum or the lush greenery of the Quezon Memorial Circle.

hotels.title: Contemporary Manila Urban Retreat in Heart of Ortigas Center
hotels.description: At the heart of Ortigas Center, Crowne Plaza Manila Galleria, an IHG Hotel, fuses convenient access to dining, entertainment and retail with a sophisticated and spacious stay. Savour a global range of flavours at Seven Corners restaurant or grab a tasty treat from the Agenda cafe. Lunge into your workout at the fitness centre, plunge into the outdoor pool or indulge in retail therapy at the many malls and retail complexes in the region, before setting out to experience the dynamic nightlife of Manila.
